item.pathoscraft.jump_wand.tooltip: Click the ground to teleport to that block!
item.pathoscraft.mana_potion.tooltip: Drinking this gives you regeneration II for 5 seconds!
item.pathoscraft.mana_herb.tooltip:
Harvested in the open world, this herb when eaten has a chance to heal you.
It's also pretty good for cooking with...
item.pathoscraft.quest_book.tooltip:
§8A log of quests available and active for you.

§7§oLegend has it...
§7§oThis book contains the power to grant §6mythical abilities§7§o by fulfilling its tasks.
block.pathoscraft.repair_block.tooltip:
Repair your jump wand by:
- §cDropping your jump wand on the block!
§r- §cClicking the repair block with your jump wand!
menu.widget.pathoscraft.quest_menu.infor:
§5Quest System Guide:
§aGreen: Quests with completed objectives.
§6Orange: Quests on your active list.
§8Grey: Quests that have been completed.

§5Controls:
• §7Left-click: Claim completed quests rewards and activate quests.
• §7Right-click: Disable active quests.
• §7Middle-click: Swap quests.

Tip: Hover over quests for details!
